text: Meghan Markle could be tapping the designer behind her engagement gown to make her wedding dress. Alexi Lubomirski / Getty Images The world is waiting with bated breath to see which designer Meghan Markle will wear when she marries Prince Harry on May 19 — and how much the The Dress will cost. Rumors have been flying that designers Roland Mouret, Inbal Dror, and Burberry's Christopher Bailey are in the running to dress the future royal for her big day. Don O'Neill, creative director of bridal, bridesmaids, and evening wear brand THEIA, told Business Insider last week he predicted Canadian designer Erdem Moralıoğlu, whose ERDEM brand has a ` ` modern Victorian with a quirky edge'' aesthetic
